A story about a dog who discovers his talent for drawing and uses it to help others overcome their fears and doubts.
A short film that follows, a dog who uses his artistic talents to create a stunning masterpiece that captures the beauty of the world around him.
A series of paintings created by a dog who uses his keen sense of color and texture to create stunning works of art that inspire awe and wonder.
A graphic novel about a dog who discovers his love for drawing and uses it to help solve mysteries and uncover secrets.
A play that explores the themes of jealousy and envy, and how a dog who is able to create beautiful art can learn to overcome his own insecurities and find joy in his own talents.
